1.content: So was it a group of teenagers or just one?
1.title: How many

111.content:
James was 16 year old extreme conservative. He was one of those who felt all gay people are going to hell, and that women and men should only have traditional roles. Anything that was out side of what he called "moral" was going to get you sent to hell. So when he heard about the Fringe Circus coming to his town he new he had to stop it before it corrupted every one in town. He tried to rally the locals into a frenzy but most of the town, even the other conservatives, thought James was just going over bored and his campaign against Fringe Circus was just some ego trip. So when that failed James decided to take matters in his own hands.
So on the first night of the circus James snuck and planted some stink bombs, spray painted crude messages all over, and did his best to create a mess. But he was caught in the act by the sherif Paul who decide to visit based on gut felling. This was really bad for James because Paul was also his uncle who took him in after James's parents died when he was 8. So James was brought before a judge and the owner of Fringe Circus Simon Fringe. The three of them talked and came to a decision about what to do with James. For the next 6 months James would have to work at Fringe Circus to pay for the damages and to learn respect.
And so that was why the skinny, dark hair, pale skin nerd was taking order from Simon Fringe. "So along with helping with helping with the day to day running, you will also have to perform as the...."
111.title: Boy

1113.content:
"A Freak-Boy, but I am not a freak, maybe to some I look like a nerd, but compare me to those creatures you got in cages of held at bay on chains, I look more like Mister Normal !" James said as argued, defending his right to be considered a normal person.

"Maybe so at present, but given you working as needing to reside here with us as part of the ongoing show, we may decide to affect some changes to add personality to your plain demeanor." So said the circus manager to James.

That having said by both there after the sheriff had left the scene, a motioned hand gesture brought two men to take hold of James, he screaming, but held soundly, incapable of getting away or able to escape and make his way home. He knew his mother would wonder and worry about her son being missing, although his step-father would feel glad to be rid of the S.O.B as he referred to James many times each day.

"Let me go," yelled James as he then turned and seeing the two men what grabbed him his indignation turned to fear and a sense of horror.
1113.title: Freak-Boy

11131.content:
"OK, you got me!" James said, as he tried to continue the conversation with the circus manager, as the two henchmen held him, literally with his feet off the ground.

The circus man laughed, and walking toward as then circling around James being held by his two captures, the man said, "You have the youthful stamina for becoming and being... a very provocative male freak. No, I think there is something more you could become, with some more permanent enhancing facially, skin tone, and adaptation, being a freak for you might be more of an enjoyable addiction!"

James hearing what was suggested as done with him, and to him, the word permanent scaring him more, he turned and looking first to the man at his right side and then to the other man on the left, He said, "Are these two... guys of something similar to what you were thinking of making happen to me?"

Indeed they were a scary pair, two huge specimens of men, exceedingly muscular, their arms, large hands, as bolstering hefty chests, both were quite hairy about the face and forearms.As James struggled against the holds of his captures, his left foot swung back and around, happening to give a sound heel kick to the genitals what aroused from the brute a dull groan.

"Sorry about that," James said, as any such kick to genitals would warrant something equally as painful done to the attacker. Oddly though, the big man just groaned and stood his ground, keeping his eyes forward, acting as if he were in a mental transient state.

"Do not bother to apologize to Roscoe, he is far enough along with his reformation process to ignore most painful experiences. His mind works on a basic level, as he reacts to my commands, his usual delight is with dominating the female freaks. By dominating I mean, he enjoys his domination of them by physical sensual forms of playmate fun.

What I just thought about as perfect for the likes of you, and the aftermath of some rather permanent physical body enhancing, you might change your attitude, and reconsider, preferring then to stay on, as live here with your fellow freaks." The circus manager said to James, and having placed sufficient worry in the mind of his newest freak, he motioned for the two monster of men to follow along.
11131.title: Got, getting, and Gotten

111311.content:
"Do I have a choice?" James asked, he feeling stupid and sheepish for asking as if he should determine his own doom.

The circus manager smiled, and after a long moment, he asked of James, "Tell me then boy, do you have some sort of alternative fun fantasy wish to be something different than of what you were born into this world?"

"Well," James said, "I do have one fun thought about being something animal-like, not all animal and not human either. If you offer me a choice as to chose what sort of freak thing I would like to look like, then my favorite sensuality is..."
111311.title: Given a choice

1113111.content: Asking about being bovine, the two favorite choice forms are...by James as chosen, while wanting to be considerate of the circus manager and his sense of goodwill...
1113111.title: Bovine a form

choices: Bovine - Male - a Satyr or goat ?
11131111.content: Acting as cautious of his choice, James kept a watchful eye of the circus manager, not knowing if his suggestion would grant a friendly as willing nod of agreement..
11131111.title: Bovine - Male

11131112.content:
James held deep his greatest wish, as the want of becoming female if ever offered the chance...

"Please, as you asked, so if given the ability to chose then my preference of gaining a different form would be of becoming female, and a bovine!" James stated, he feeling green with wild sense of envy for what females feel.
11131112.title: Bovine - Transgender - Female

111312.content:
They four walked past many a sightseer standing as gawking there along the circus midway. The manager led the way, as entered a small tent set up adjacent to a travel trailer. He opened the trailer door and let the two large men deposit James inside, as they turned and stood guard just outside the trailer door. James was unsure what to think or even to know what he dare ask, so he stood there acting obedient and waited for the gavel of his judgment to slam home his certain doom.

"So what, the sheriff said I was your prisoner for six months of working off the damages I caused, what is this bit about permanent enhancements and deciding to remain with the circus?" James asked, as suddenly feeling bold, he thought to come on toward the circus manager with some bravado.

"You two remain outside as on guard, I wish to be alone with my soon to be new star of the show!" The manager said to his two huge henchmen, as both grunted their answer of agreement, doing what was asked of them.

As the man entered he offered James a friendly sort of smile, as then reaching a hand inside a wall mounted cabinet, he said, "Your name was James, well as from what I have here, what I hold in my hand, this small bottle holds such a enzyme, as from injecting 50ml of it into your bloodstream, would begin your journey along a pathway from being human to becoming animalistic and bestial.

The animalistic portion of your soon new fame shall feel in you as a wild and arousing thrill-seeking experience. As what we lost recently was our beloved pet donkey. Comer the donkey worked for the past five years as a petting donkey by day and a molester of paying customers most every night. He began by becoming a willing freak Donkey-Boy in the midway shows, and asking to advance, he entered the erotic-frolicking night scene. Comer excelled at stimulating his female fun seeker partners, hurting a few, but inspiring most to wish as want to come again whenever the circus came to town.

The becoming bestial is as much the desire of human partners while being then in part an animal physically. As this would make you another Donkey-Boy, your bodily instincts would desire either human or animal partners, therefore you would become bestial of your nature.

I then becoming willing to the tasks at hand and finding you fun by doing, when ready or having asked, by another 50 ml injection your body would change to look as if more donkey than of being human. The donkey stud fun would increase, as able then to breed with circus animals, your duty then would include being a factual stallion to mare horses, ponies, and zebras too!"

James stood there with his mouth hung open and tongue lolling out the side of his mouth, as aroused, his saliva trickled in threaded strings from off his tongue.

"Duh, me a donkey...boy, as becoming then a breeding stud, with women, with mares, ponies and zebra mares too, I do not know about all that, that seems so wrong, so immoral. You do all that to me and it becomes permanent as part of the real me, what then if after six months I ask to go home, what then?" James said as wondering did ask, but from hearing all what was told of him he felt his groin acting as aroused, the boyish wish of owning a massive male tool seemed within his grasp as gaining.
111312.title: Decided the Future

1113122.content:
James smiled at the circus manager holding the small ampule of serum, as the manager held a smirked grin of hope for James to say yes and be agreeable.

"What you say is how you wish me to be, as become and stay, aroused as thrilled, fondled and or molested as molesting, the idea of it is arousing to me!

However, the thought of moral ideals taught to me, as practiced by our family, such physical changes, once done I could not return home, my mother and certainly my step-father would disown me. The gaining of a male organ equal to that on a Jack stud donkey tickles my soul with the wish to say yes, as yes, please inoculate me now." James said as he argued the pro or con to his future of bestial doom.

"One injection does not make the change of form obvious, as it enhances what a human keeps covered by clothing. If then with time and frolicking the second inoculation happens, then the physical changes tend to show boldly the donkified form. As what Comer did with his acceptance of the second injection, he began walking around fully naked, though completely fur covered. The primary change addresses the genitals, growing a sheath, increasing the size and volume to testicles, while gaining the physical shaft cock a stud donkey has for his good pleasure. Granted there is some minor influx change as sprouting new body hair, especially on the chest, around the groin, pelvis, and upper thighs.

The furrier the donkey-boy the more the women love to comb their fingers through the fur and stimulate their stud mate to mate.

You become being our new circus Donkey-Boy and agree as do as I say, your existence will be something wild and wonderful!" The circus manager said as promised, told James what to expect.

James stood there, wondering, considering, thinking about his leaving behind a loving mother and several school chums.
1113122.title: Moral or Immoral ?

choices: Friends of a feather love to forlic together
11131222.content:
Wild ideas of equally fun-loving good friends, the thought comes of wishing to share the good fortune.

"I think, there is a thought as of some friends who, if given, offered the choice, granted the chance, they too would want as be willing to come join the circus and be equally as bestial of desire." James said, he suggesting to beckon friends to join him as partners in a bestial doom.

"Hmm...," the circus manager said as he stood rubbing his chin in thought, giving consideration to what James was suggesting as a possibility.
11131222.title: Thoughts as to friends

112.content: Sammy was a bratty 16 year old blond girl. She was pretty, athletic, had a DD cup, and was as bitchy as they come. Now simply because she made some little goat boy cry and broke the unicycle he was riding, she was ordered by the court that she had to work at the Fringe's Show. A circus known for taking in people that suffer from animalism (a genetic disorder that causes people to look like animals) along with other genetic disorders. Now here she was standing front of James Fringe, the ring master and owner of Fringe's Show, listening to him prattle on about the show's integrity and how she must learn to respect all these ugly little freaks. James Fringe who had the elephant type of animalism, was a big man but not huge, had thick gray skin and a little trunk. He had stubby little fingers, elephant feet. Just by looking at her James know Sammy was going to be trouble.
112.title: Girl

choices: Goat-Boy tests Sammy by use of his right index finger.
Goat-Boy decides that Sammy will do njcely!
1122.content:
"What sort of talents do you have, I mean to ask as are you good with Math or talkative enough to become a good huckster?" Mr. Fringe asked Samantha, (Sammy)

"None, sir as much I despise this place for it vale of sin!" Religious young as brash and foolhardy was Sammy then as she thought to be of no help to their cause.

"The court says you are to work here, if there be nothing special about you, we have ways of giving you a feeling of usefulness!" Mr. Fringe said, as he did a hand waving motion for someone to come and join the argument.

"Mr. Fringe, so this is her, our outspoken protagonist. Timmy could use a new partner in his balancing act, she being generally trim and those big jugs on her, she could do to increase the humor content." Suggested a gaunt looking tall as thin sort of man, speaking to the circus manager.

"No nothing that might become permanent, she is going to be with us for six months of probation," said Mr. Fringe.

"That makes her a challenge, Goat-boy might like her as a partner, after all it was he action that sent him back to doing his male striptease acting. I could make her his female double, and the patrons would love to watch them spar and/or mate together." The tall man suggested, as the thought of making the Goat-man happier, a nod of the head was all the man needed to culminate the dealing.

Taking a firm grasp to the shoulders of her blouse, the tall man shuffled Sammy off and along down a row of tents to where one tent flap lay open. "Inside," the man ordered as said to Sammy, she literally flung inside the tent and before she could react accordingly, he was inside with her, binding her wrists to a center set tent-pole.

"Stay put, as for what I have as a plan for doing to you takes two men to handle a subject!" The tall man said, and Sammy finding her wrists bound as being tight, all she could do was to await what the man had a plan for her to work, make paid restitution.

Minutes later and returning with the one man was a shorter but furrier fellow, it being his duties to check on the animal people and those who for whatever the reason required animal-costume fittings.
1122.title: Given Usefullness

13.content: and has it something to do with winner of the esc "conchita wurst"
13.title: Three

132.content: Is it a group of all boys, all girls, or a mix? Third lucks a charm ya know.
132.title: no

choices: Heads with a body carrying them, good for juggling
1322.content:
This is the story of three unfortunate girls who have yet to face a terrible fate. They seemed innocent, but a little dash of sin will change all of that forever.

Tammy: A calm and mellow girl who is often the voice of reason and is the smartest of the girls. She has a black pony tailed hair that is draped over her shoulders and blue eyes.

Jodie: A tough and strong willed girl that have a hot blooded attitude that often gets herself in trouble. She is the most physical of the girls. She has blond hair with twin tails and green eyes.

Maddie: A ditzy and happy go lucky girl who is often clumsy, but is too kind hearted to the point that she talks to strangers. Most likely to say things from her head comparing to the other girls. She has medium sized light brown hair with a small pony tail by the side of her head and brown eyes.

...

Their story begins when they visited a circus for the summer break. School is out and their parents are out of town. This gives them a chance to do what they want, but that attitude can cause problems you know. They manage to sneak in since Jodie had this amazing plan to meet the freaks behind the scenes.

"Wow, I this place looks amazing.", said Tammy.

"Bet you $5 that I can beat the strongest guy here.", said Jodie.

"Oh Jodie, you might be strong, but not that strong.", said Maddie.

"Say that again!", said Jodie.

"Calm down girls. We don't want to cause any attention.", said Tammy.

"If your so worried about being here, then why come?", asked Jodie.

"I'm worried that you girls will get yourself in trouble.", said Tammy.

"Your funny. We'll be fine by ourselves.", said Maddie.

Maddie suddenly tripped and at the worst possible time since she landed on the Ring Master himself. The man looked like a butler with a classy look to him. The girls looked at him the man in fear, but Jodie tried to punch him only to be subdue by his skills.

"Naughty naughty girls. The show starts tomorrow at noon. Guess I'll have to teach you a lesson like the other kids.", said the Ring Master.

"I'm sorry mister. We'll leave right now if you like.", said Tammy.

"Geez, that bastard knows how to fight.", said Jodie.

"You girls should follow Ms. Tammy's example though she is just as bad as you two. Jodie and Maddie.", said the Ring Master.

"He knows our names.", said Maddie.

"I suppose I'll let you girls watch the show by being part of it.", said the Ring Master before laughing evilly

The lights turn off for the girls and everything turned black for them as they screamed. When the girls woke up they felt different. Its as if something is not right. A mirror of sorts was on top of them and they were shocked to see what happened to them.

They...
1322.title: All girls

choices: Moving on to their turn of performing
13222.content:
"How are we alive?", asked Tammy.

"I don't know, but I can't feel my hands or legs for that matter.", said Jodie.

"That's because we don't have any!", cried Maddie.

"We became freaks!", said Tammy.

The body that was behind them picked the heads of the girls and they looked at it. It seems as if the Ring Master has stitched up some body parts from their old bodies to make a new one. The body wore a black web like dress with some elegance with it.

"I got to admit, we sort of look cool. I mean we could do a juggling act with our heads. We could be our own monster too. We can be called Ms. Headson. Get it, because we are a bunch of heads", said Maddie.

The Ring Master came clapping, "I'm glad your up in spirits Ms. Maddie. Usually the bad kids would cry or be angry. Ms. Headson, genius. Maybe punishing you isn't so bad."

"Oh I'm angry alright!", cried Jodie.

"Aw aw aw. You girls now have to share this body and only one head can be attached. Without a head, it has a mind of its own.", said the Ring Master.

"So who will go first?", asked Tammy.

The body picked Tammy and attached Tammy onto her neck. Tammy is left carrying the heads of her friends.

"How come Tammy gets the body?", asked Jodie.

"I'm guess its because Tammy won't kill me.", said the Ring Master.

"Even as a head, Jodie just can't stop losing it.", said Maddie.

"If I ever get hands again, I will crush you!", said Jodie.

"Tamper tamper. You'll never get attached with that attitude. I order the body to not allow any naughty heads on its neck.", said the Ring Master.

"I hate you.", said the blond.

"So have you girls come up with an act?", asked the Ring Master.

"We are thinking about juggling, but maybe something more.", said Maddie.

The Ring Master went to pick up Maddie's head, "Of all my freaks and seven victims, I'm starting to love you."

The man then hugs Maddie's head while Tammy and Jodie just sighs. The man returned Maddie's head and went off to somewhere. And so...
13222.title: Heads with a body carrying them, good for juggling

132222.content:
The lights all shine at the Ring Master in the center of the circus. Everyone was amazed on how the show was as of now. They are more excited to see this new performer that will appear anytime soon.

"Lady and gentleman. I would like to present you our latest family member, Ms. Headson! Three decapitated heads and one body. Not conjoined, but apart!", said the Ring Master.

The body with the heads of Tammy, Jodie, and Maddie walked to the center. Maddie whispers to the body to try to go according to plan. When they reached to the center, the body first did a basic juggling act with the heads of Tammy and Jodie getting sick while Maddie screamed with joy.

The body then started dancing while trying to maintain her posture in juggling the heads. She not only does it with her hands, but her feet. Everyone was amazed on how unique the juggling act was and cheered. After they were done, they went back stage and rested.

Maddie and Tammy looked sick while Maddie is attached to the body and slowly rock the heads of her friends. They slowly recovered after that.

"Now I know how balls feel. Its such a sad life.", said Tammy.

"Oh, I still feel sick even though I don't have a stomach.", said Jodie.

"At least our heads look like cute round balls. I mean look at us. Our face structure looks a little rounder and we have no necks so we look like balls.", said Maddie.

"I never notice. But how can we live as heads? We should have died.", asked Tammy.

"MAGIC!", sang the Ring Master as he fluttered by.

"You girls were amazing! I love your energy Maddie and I see that the body learned to do more that an average juggler beyond physics. Who taught her that?", asked the man.

"I did sir. I predicted on how high our heads will fly based on our weight and such. Its complicated to explain.", said Tammy's head.

"An intelligent fellow are you? Lovely. You girls make me happier than ever. I feel bad and good on turning you girls into that.", said the man.

"Its fine, we sort of deserve it. But this is a bit extreme too.", said Tammy.

"What's done is done", said the man.

"What now?", asked Jodie.

They went off to...
132222.title: Moving on to their turn of performing

1322221.content:
"Clean up time!", screamed a Frankenstein like man.

"So it is.", said the Ring Master.

The Frankenstein went around packing things up in bags, boxes, and suit cases. The girls were overwhelmed at the beast's speed and strength.

"That's Ferb. I found him at birth and its so sad that he was abandon though he is a strong man now despite not clear in the mind.", said the Ring Master.

"Well nice kid you got there.", said Jodie.

"You don't see me insult you Ms. Jodie. You better get your head in the game and be head strong since you'll be in for a ride that you made you lose your head.", said the Ring Master.

"I'm not insulted by that anymore.", said Jodie.

"I tried.", said the Ring Master.

"That was pretty cool.", said Maddie.

"She gets it.", said the Ring Master.

Ferb got a new suit case and grabbed the heads of the girls. He put them in the suit case meant for big juggling balls and closed it. Their body then held it as if she is going vacation.

"Your heads apparently count as props so Ferb wouldn't know better.", said the Ring Master.

Everything was loaded onto a truck and the freaks and the Ring Master headed off to their new location. They ended up...
1322221.title: Pack up

choices: Greet people on the opening day
13222211.content:
The girls body opens up the case where the three heads were stored in. They were breathing for fresh air despite not having any lungs.

"Man, it was stuffy in here.", said Tammy.

"I can't tell whose hair was in my mouth.", said Jodie.

"Not me. Mines the shortest.", said Maddie.

The body picks up her heads and not attach any of them as they went to...
13222211.title: In another town

choices: Says she'll try to stop biting
132222112.content:
The three heads looked at the bunch of people who are amazed about the freaks. Each greeting, hand shaking or petting them like a zoo. Jodie looked upset of how degrading this is while Maddie looks happy in meeting new people.

"I miss home.", said Jodie.

"I know Jodie, but this is our new home. Even if we returned, we wouldn't know how to get back to normal.", said Tammy.

"I wanna make new friends.", said Maddie.

The body went up to people showing her three decapitated head. Maddie seems to like being carried around by kids as they use her as a ball. Jodie was prone to biting if they made the wrong move. Tammy's head was placed on a barrel while her body has to discipline Jodie's head for biting people. Tammy does talk to people and tries to hold back her emotions while doing so.

"Your only a head. Cool.", said a kid.

"Its not as fun as you think. Its a major headache.", said Tammy's head.

"Where's your body miss?", asked another kid.

"Its handling our other heads. We share a body, but we're detached.", said Tammy.

Suddenly Maddie's head was sent flying and landed near the group.

"We're called Ms. Headson the head juggler.", said Maddie's head, "Hope you'll see us in action soon."

The kids left leaving Maddie and Tammy's heads alone.

"Where is Jodie? I need the body to bring me back to the kids.", asked Maddie.

"Jodie bites people if they were to insult or annoy her. The body has to teach her a lesson.", said Tammy.

The two heads then see their friend back with their single body. Jodie...
132222112.title: Greet people on the opening day

1322221121.content:
"Jodie, just because that guy tried to finger you, doesn't mean you bite him." said Tammy.

"Easy for you to say. Being only a head makes me feel so vulnerable." said Jodie, "I think I forgot what its like to have a body."

"Maybe if you behave a little more, the body will put you on. The ringmaster did say that it will only attach well behaved heads." said Tammy.

"Fine, I'll try to not bite others and behave." said Jodie.

The body then places Jodie's head next to Tammy as the body picked Tammy's head up. The body also picked up Maddie's head by the hair as the head winced in pain. The body was trying to choose which head she wants to put on and decided to attach...
1322221121.title: Says she'll try to stop biting

13223.content:
They are gross fat men from the neck down!

"I see you are awake" the tall butter spoke as they began to stir. "Before any of you has a chance to see whats happened let me explain. You are now members of our freak show. Until I've seen all 3 of you learn your lesson, you will remain this way. Now take this time to explore. There's a scale behind you, and your costumes are at your feet. You go on in one hour." Said the butler as he moved on the a different section of the tent.

"Freak show? What could he be talking about?" Asked Maddie. She then looked sown and screamed. "AAAAAAAHHHHH"

The other girls joined her and started to cry. "Why did they do this to us?!" Jodie sobbed as she held up her hairy gut. All three lost their cute feminine bodies and gained the bodies of 3 overweight men.

"This is so strange!" Tammy said as she finally stood up. "Woah, my balance is all off" She waddled over to a full length mirror and looked herself over. "I'm in total control of this whole body. Look, we all have penises!"

Maddie was next to stand up, still with tears in her eyes. She felt her fat giggle as she joined Tammy at the mirror. "Tammy you have a ton of back hair." She said looking over her friend.

"So do you! But it looks like my penis is bigger." Tammy laughed at little at how strange that sounded coming from her sweetie voice.

"That's not your penis!" Jodie yelled still refusing to move. "Come on you two don't you see how messed up this is?" Jodie was whipping her tears away with her meaty hairy hands.

"We wouldn't be here if is wasn't for your aggressiveness. This is your fault Jodie!" Tammy snapped. "Looks like this is us for now, until we've learned our lesson. Let's play along"

Both Maddie and Jodie gave her a strange look. "What? We can't undo this, might as well make the best of this. Plus I was going to start my lady time this week. I'm fine with be a fat man for the next 7 days."

Jodie finally got up and noticed the scale. Then she saw the costume she was supposed to wear....
13223.title: Something else frightening

info.description: This story is about a teenager or teenagers who sneak into a circus to make fun of some of the freaks. They also damage some of the property, so to pay for all the trouble they caused they have to work for the circus. The Ringmaster plans to make them work at the Freak Show as the freaks.
